TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackBar extends System.Windows.Forms.Control implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public Class TrackBar Inherits Control Implements ISupportInitialize

summary.span: 表示標準的 Windows 追蹤列。

span.span: Represents a standard Windows track bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可捲動的控制項類似控制項。The is a scrollable control similar to the control. 您可以設定透過此範圍的值藉由設定捲動屬性的追蹤列屬性，以指定範圍的下限和屬性，以指定範圍的高端。You can configure ranges through which the value of the property of a track bar scrolls by setting the property to specify the lower end of the range and the property to specify the upper end of the range. 屬性會定義以新增或刪減遞增值時按下會發生的捲動方塊的任一端的屬性。The property defines the increment to add or subtract from the property when clicks occur on either side of the scroll box. 可以顯示在追蹤列，水平或垂直。The track bar can be displayed horizontally or vertically. 您可以使用此控制項來輸入數字資料透過取得屬性。You can use this control to input numeric data obtained through the property. 您可以在控制項中顯示此數字的資料，或在程式碼中使用它。You can display this numeric data in a control or use it in code. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含控制項和控制項。The following code example displays a form containing a control and a control. 此範例示範設定， ， ，和屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 內容會更新為屬性值時就會發生事件。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立具有預設的水平方向，而且範圍為 0 到 10，每個值所顯示的刻度。The is created with a default horizontal orientation and a range of 0 to 10, with a tick mark shown for every value.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool AutoSize { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property AutoSize As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AutoSize { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出追蹤列的高度或寬度是否會自動調整大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height or width of the track bar is being automatically sized.

value.span: 如果 TrackBar 會自動調整大小，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the track bar is being automatically sized; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定屬性`true`導致追蹤列 （如果水平對齊），請調整其高度或寬度 （如果以垂直方式對齊）。You can set the property to `true` to cause the track bar to adjust its height (if horizontally aligned) or width (if vertically aligned). 根據螢幕解析度顯示在追蹤列的標準大小會調整的高度或寬度。The height or width is adjusted to a standard size based on the screen resolution on which the track bar is displayed. 設定屬性`false`如果您想要自行調整大小。Set the property to `false` if you want to adjust the size yourself.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AutoSizeChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`TrackBar1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TrackBar1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 取得或設定當捲動方塊大距離移動時，會從 屬性加或減的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a large distance.

The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下 PAGE UP 或 PAGE DOWN 鍵，或按一下追蹤列的捲動方塊中，任一端屬性變更的設定值根據屬性。When the user presses the PAGE UP or PAGE DOWN key or clicks the track bar on either side of the scroll box, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 您可以考慮設定的百分比值（垂直方向的追蹤列的） 或（水平方向的追蹤列的） 值。You might consider setting the value to a percentage of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) value. 如此可讓您追蹤列的移動的距離其大小成正比。This keeps the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含控制項和控制項。The following code example displays a form containing a control and a control. 此範例示範設定， ， ，和屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 內容會更新為屬性值時就會發生事件。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBar/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The assigned value is less than 0.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

Protected Overridable Sub OnScroll (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用更新其他控制項的捲動方塊變更位置的事件。You can use the event to update other controls as the position of the scroll box changes. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當系統色彩變更時，將會重繪控制項。The control will redraw when the system colors change. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::Orientation Orientation { System::Windows::Forms::Orientation get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::Orientation value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出追蹤列的水平或垂直方向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the track bar.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為，捲動方塊從左移到右邊為會增加。When the property is set to , the scroll box moves from left to right as the increases. 當屬性設定為，捲動方塊從底部移到頂端，做為會增加。When the property is set to , the scroll box moves from bottom to top as the increases. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定某些屬性。The following example demonstrates how to set some of the properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性搭配為國際化應用程式的語言由右至左，例如希伯來文或阿拉伯文寫入的屬性。The property is used with the property for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作追蹤列上的捲動方塊捲動根據事件，以修改資訊在表單上的標籤。The following code example shows how to implement the event to modify information labels on a form, based on the scrolling of the scroll box on a track bar. 這個範例需要三個追蹤橫條圖與置於其上的三個標籤。The example requires a with three track bars and three labels placed on it. [!code-cpp[TrackBar#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Trackbar/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[TrackBar#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Trackbar/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[TrackBar#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Trackbar/VB/form1.vb#3)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示包含表單的控制項和控制項。The following code example displays a form that contains a control and a control. 此範例示範設定， ， ，和屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 內容會更新為屬性值時就會發生事件。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，若要設定的整個範圍在相同的時間。You can use this method to set the entire range for the at the same time. 若要個別設定的最小值或最大值，請使用和屬性。To set the minimum or maximum values individually, use the and properties. 如果`minValue`參數大於`maxValue`參數，`maxValue`設為等於`minValue`。If the `minValue` parameter is greater than the `maxValue` parameter, `maxValue` is set equal to `minValue`.

span.span: Gets or sets the value added to or subtracted from the property when the scroll box is moved a small distance.
A numeric value.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下方向鍵，其中屬性變更的設定值根據屬性。When the user presses one of the arrow keys, the property changes according to the value set in the property. 您可以考慮的值設定值的百分比（垂直方向的追蹤列的） 或（水平方向的追蹤列的） 屬性。You might consider setting the value of to a percentage of the value of the (for a vertically oriented track bar) or (for a horizontally oriented track bar) property. 這會設定它的大小成正比追蹤列的移動的距離。This sets the distance your track bar moves proportionate to its size. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示包含表單的控制項和控制項。The following code example displays a form that contains a control and a control. 此範例示範設定， ， ，和屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 內容會更新為屬性值時就會發生事件。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定控制項上描繪的刻度間之差異。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the delta between ticks drawn on the control.

value.span: 表示刻度間差異的數值。

span.span: The numeric value representing the delta between ticks.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如的之間的值範圍較大和屬性，它可能是適合所有值的刻度繪製的控制項上。For a with a large range of values between the and the properties, it might be impractical to draw all the ticks for values on the control. 比方說，如果您有 100 的範圍的控制項，傳入的值為 5 這裡會使控制項繪製 20 個刻度。For example, if you have a control with a range of 100, passing in a value of 5 here causes the control to draw 20 ticks. 在此情況下，每個刻度表示值的範圍中的五個單位。In this case, each tick represents five units in the range of values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示包含表單的控制項和控制項。The following code example displays a form that contains a control and a control. 此範例示範設定， ， ，和屬性和處理事件。The example demonstrates setting the , , , and properties and handling the event. 內容會更新為屬性值時就會發生事件。The contents are updated to the property value when the event occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要更新其他控制項列修訂中代表的值時，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to update other controls when the value represented in the track bar changes. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，和成員以及如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the , , and members and how to handle the event. 若要執行此範例，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含控制項名稱`TrackBar1`和控制項，名為`TextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code into a form that contains a control name `TrackBar1` and a control named `TextBox1`. 呼叫`InitializeTrackBar`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理方法。Call the `InitializeTrackBar` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TrackBarExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]
